text: Hearing a great deal about #chloroquine's efficacy against #corona. Born in 70's I know this very cheap and easily available drug was used to cure #Malaria. Elders used to tell us that it contains #quinine extracted from what is called ब्रैंकड़  in #Dogri. @Viv_1_mahajan @DAkkhar https://t.co/Ba4665yXD4
